page.title: 11Population-Cefn Hengoed
page.content: The village of Cefn Hengoed is fairly typical of the residential areas of the Rhymney Valley and the rectangle being studied.It comprises {a)5 rows of older houses built after {the first world war for miners. } {b)A 1950's council estate (some of {which are now privately owned). {c)A 10 year old development of private {housing. { { }Of the families living in the original 5 houses, some 15% of their descendants still live there, but almost as many moved to the council estate when it was built. A small number moved to the private estate when that was built. {_______________________ {
